Reviews.Title: “Thumbs Up..”
Reviews.Author: JonasKevin
Reviews.Content: I crashed in this hotel without any reservation because my train to Venice was cancelled, i did get some luck finding them because they are near the termini station, plus they accomodated me without a problem and gave me a good price on the room. The room is a bit small, but the place is clean and everything is quite well, didn't expect it from the looks outside the building. The staff are young and they are really professional on their work. They are a very friendly people. The breakfast was not that bad, it's quite sufficient. I recommend this hotel, it's near the center of rome, plus it is near to all public transportation, so if you came back late at night there is no worries at all. Hope to come back to them soon.

Reviews.Title: “great!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: John s
Reviews.Content: I'm a student and I happened to travel a lot, I stayed in this nice and cousy hotel in the month of March. They mada my stay in Rome the highlight of my trip in Europe, because their accomodation was very nice and it felt like I was home. The staff was very nice and very helpful, plus the gave me tips on how to move around Rome conveniently. The position of the hotel was also convinient, it's near the Terminal station so even if I came back late, I still got the chance to come back to the hotel without a problem. The room was nice and neat and the breakfast is good and sufficient. I suggest this hotel to every traveler who wants to make his stay good in Rome. I'll come back for sure if I ever have the chance again.

Reviews.Title: “Close to Termini, but the hotel is a mess...”
Reviews.Author: BogdanGabriel
Reviews.Content: The rooms are very clean, but very small, you can barely move around the bed. Within the same building there are 3-4 hotels, so lots of people keep moving around. The breakfast is very poor and unappropriately served in a room where you can also find a travel office, lots of boxes and big toys aso.

Reviews.Title: “awful”
Reviews.Author: mirelladickinson
Reviews.Content: We booked for twin rooms, when we got there, they did not have the booking, they gave us a room with no rail in the wardrobe, a double bed and the room was so small you could not open the wardrobe, eventually after complaining they gave us the room next door, but it took a lot of complaining. this was not much better, the shower was so small do not try to use it if you are over a size uk 8, it was beyond a joke, It felt a real dive. it was also lucky we did not need heating,, the aircon looked burnt out with not controls. would avoid. they still charged me the full amount with no apology. Look out as it also goes under other names like Philia.

Reviews.Title: “It's worst hotel I'd ever see”
Reviews.Author: julianakiseleva
Reviews.Content: We had a honey moon and was in Rome for 12 days. And we stayed in different 3 Hotels: 1) Des Artistes - it was perfect, nice staff very good breakfast. 2) Then Andreotti - it's was okey, staff was not so friendly and don't speak much English. But breakfast was very good. 3) Then we came in this awful place. It's very mean place. You can decide on your own: - they didn't bring to us any new glasses - shampoo and soap only when we ask on the reception - and after last cleaning brought only one towel. It's room for two. - breakfast is very-very bad - you can take only one coffee and it' very bad and one croissant. I never see something like this before - we book our hotel through HotelTravel.com and they did a nistake in the voucher. And we had to pay but those people ask us for a 100 euros for room instead 70 like on site. And argue with us and threaten with police. It was last day in Rome and we had flight. At least if you ask such money you had provide a good service. My advice never stay in this hotel :( I'm very disappointed they screwed up the last day of our honey moon.

Reviews.Title: “Very good for the price”
Reviews.Author: Romelover68
Reviews.Content: It is very OK, good central location. Nice and friendly staff. Breakfast very good, concidering normal Italien Standard. Rooms are small but they are clean. Entrance hall and lift area is terrible, but when you come into the different floors belonging to Adventure everyhting is nice and fine.

Reviews.Title: “It's not so bad”
Reviews.Author: EuroAdv
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Hotel Adventure on our way home to Australia. We had gotten off the bus in Rome and needed two nights. Hotel Adventure was the first hotel available, and not too far to walk with our luggage! I did not find a problem with it. We stayed in a comfortable clean room on the fifth floor. It was quiet. The shock was the size of the bathroom, especially the shower, which I could hardly get into. The whole bathroom was approx 1m x 1m and fitted a toilet, bidet, sink & shower. The breakfasts were good, and I really enjoyed the coffee - anyway you wanted and bottomless. We paid 80 Euros a night for a double. I couldn't compare to anything else - but it wasn't so bad.

Reviews.Title: “Filty/ scarry "Hotel Adventure" is a nightmare”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This place is scarry. I've stayed at many hostals in Ireland, and Italy, and never experienced anything like "Hotel Adventure". The hall/ stair/ elevator are all filthy, in poor repair and dimly lit. The room had no seat on the toilet. I advise anyone to find accomidations elsewhere. There are plenty of places near Hotel Adventure that are cheeper or on par in cost, but have a much better feeling about them.

Reviews.Title: “worst adventure of my life!”
Reviews.Author: tracybraylina
Reviews.Content: horrible, horrible, horrible! first, lets start with the area. a shady area on the bad side of town. the type of hotel people rent where girls rent the rooms by the hour if you know what i mean! the people at the desk were as rude as rude could get. our room was filthy and disgusting! rain was leaking through the roof. when we asked the manager to fix it or let us move rooms he said that we had gotten a disocunted room rate off the internet so we should not complain! he hung up on us! the sheets were dirty and the bathroom was horrible. i was scared the whole time. do not go here!

Reviews.Title: “Our stay at Hotel Adventure”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Elevator not very reliable (the kind you see in the 1920's movie). Operated on a first come first serve basis and shared with other hotels in the building. Faster to take the stairs. Good service for breakfast. All you can drink cappuccino for coffee lovers. There is no variety so it's best not to have inclusive breakfast. Terrible housekeeping service. Brought gift & tip generously but found out later she did not change our bed sheets. Advice.. check if you have a clean one! Pull out the tucked away part of your sheet and inspect for any particles. False advertising..there is no FREE internet access. We don't recommend a room with a terrace.Kara

HotelInfo.Name: Adventure Hotel Roma
HotelInfo.Address: Via Palestro 88, 00185 Rome, Italy
